lead_paragraph: The Dodgers’ Chase Utley broke the leg of Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada while trying to break up a double play in a National League division series last season, leading to a rule change addressing so-called rolling slides.

headline.print_headline: Suspension of Utley Is Rescinded, Reports Say
headline.main: Suspension of Chase Utley Is Rescinded, Reports Say

snippet: The Dodgers’ Chase Utley broke the leg of Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada while trying to break up a double play in a National League division series last season, leading to a rule change addressing so-called rolling slides.
abstract: Major League Baseball lifts suspension of Los Angeles Dodgers player Chase Utley after league reaches agreement with players' union; Utley earned suspension for aggressive slide that broke New York Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada's leg.
